note.p: Honours: OBE 1918; CBE 1922; CB 1926; KCB 1931; GBE 1939; GCB 1942
AssocMaterial: CSAC 9/3/74. Papers deposited in the College Archives, Imperial College of Science and Technology, London
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1972 vol 18 pp 525-548, plate, by Charles F Goodeve
References: Russell Moseley, 'Government Science and the Royal Society: The Control of the National Physical Laboratory in the Inter-War Years' in NR 1980 vol 35 pp 167-193
